Getting started ​

Essential information to help you get set up with LibreSudoku.

Installation guide ​

1. Downloading LibreSudoku ​

  1. Visit our download page to get the latest version of LibreSudoku.
  2. After the download is complete, open the libresudoku-v1.5.0.apk file.
  3. Proceed with the installation process.

2. (Recommended) Set up automatic backups ​

Once LibreSudoku is installed on your device, you can enable automatic backups

  1. Open the LibreSudoku app.
  2. Navigate to the "More" section.
  3. Tap on the "Backup & restore" tab.
  4. Press the "Grant" button.
  5. Choose any folder you want and press "Use this folder".
  6. You can change the frequency of automatic backups.

Relevant guide: Automatic Backups
